document.full_text: the obama administration has full confidence in the top u.s. aviation safety official and his agency following a string of highly publicized lapses by air traffic controllers, including one this week involving a plane carrying first lady michelle obama.
document.title: obama administration backs faa despite uproar
lines_and_colors: the obama administration has full confidence in the top u.s. aviation safety official and his agency following a string of highly publicized lapses by air traffic controllers, including one this week involving a plane carrying first lady michelle obama.
